channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 朝鲜金正恩与中国国家主席习近平互致信息承诺建立更密切的关系 - 韩联社
item.description: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un and Chinese President Xi Jinping vowed to further develop relationship of cooperation between the two countries, in New Year messages exchanged on Monday, South Korea's Yonhap news reported citing the North's state radio.翻译:据韩国联合通讯社援引朝鲜国家广播电台报道，朝鲜领导人金正恩和中国国家主席习近平在周一互致的新年贺词中誓言进一步发展两国之间的合作关系。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 德约科维奇帮助塞尔维亚队在联合杯中击败中国队
item.description: Novak Djokovic closed out his spectacular 2023 on a winning note as the world number one eased past China's Zhang Zhizhen 6-3 6-2 on his United Cup debut on Sunday before doubling up to secure a 2-1 victory for Serbia in the mixed team tournament.翻译:诺瓦克·德约科维奇在周日的联合杯首秀中以 6-3 6-2 轻松击败中国选手张志臻，以胜利结束了他辉煌的 2023 年，随后在混合团体赛中帮助塞尔维亚 2-1 获胜比赛。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 习近平称2024年中国将巩固和提升经济复苏
item.description: President Xi Jinping said on Sunday that China will consolidate and enhance the positive trend of its economic recovery in 2024, and sustain long-term economic development with deeper reforms.翻译:习近平主席周日表示，2024年中国将巩固和增强经济复苏的积极势头，以深化改革推动经济长期发展。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国十年来最严重地震后找到的最后尸体
item.description: The bodies of the two remaining people missing in the aftermath of China's most serious earthquake in nearly a decade were found on Sunday, a tragedy that has renewed concern over exposed populations in seismically active zones.翻译:周日，在中国近十年来最严重的地震中失踪的两名失踪人员的尸体于周日被发现，这场悲剧再次引发了人们对地震活跃地区暴露在外的民众的担忧。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国12月工厂收缩加剧，可能出台更多刺激措施
item.description: China's manufacturing activity shrank for a third straight month in December.翻译:12 月份中国制造业活动连续第三个月萎缩。
item.author: Liangping Gao, Kevin Yao

item.title: 中国习近平称与台湾“统一”是不可避免的
item.description: China's "reunification" with Taiwan is inevitable, President Xi Jinping said in his New Year's address on Sunday, striking a stronger tone than he did last year with less than two weeks to go before the Chinese-claimed island elects a new leader.翻译:中国国家主席习近平在周日的新年致辞中表示，中国与台湾的“统一”是不可避免的，他的语气比去年更强硬，距离这个中国声称拥有主权的岛屿将选出新领导人还有不到两周的时间。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国如何说服市场放弃人民币挤兑
item.description: Interviews with 28 sources show at least two dozen cases where regulators steered market participants through coordinated actions this year to resist pressure on the currency.翻译:对 28 名消息人士的采访显示，今年监管机构引导市场参与者采取协调行动以抵抗货币压力的案例至少有两打。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 东盟外长对南海紧张局势表示担忧
item.description: Foreign ministers of Southeast Asia's regional bloc ASEAN on Saturday expressed their concern over growing tensions in the South China Sea which they said could threaten regional peace and urged for peaceful dialogue among parties.翻译:东南亚区域集团东盟的外交部长周六对南海日益紧张的局势表示担忧，称这可能威胁到地区和平，并敦促各方进行和平对话。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国军队清洗暴露弱点，可能扩大
item.description: The purges are a setback for Xi Jinping, who has pumped billions into the military.翻译:这次清洗对习近平来说是一次挫折，他已经向军队投入了数十亿美元。
item.author: Yew Lun Tian, Laurie Chen

item.title: 中国央行同意蚂蚁集团旗下支付宝没有控制人
item.description: China's central bank has agreed that popular payment app Alipay has no controller following a sweeping business overhaul of Jack Ma's Ant Group, the fintech giant that owns the app, according to the website of the People's Bank of China.翻译:据中国人民银行网站称，在对马云旗下的金融科技巨头蚂蚁集团进行全面业务整顿后，中国央行已同意流行支付应用程序支付宝没有控制人。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国放宽美国游客签证申请
item.description: China will simplify visa applications for tourists from the United States from Jan. 1, cutting the documents required, according to a notice on Friday on the website of the Chinese embassy in Washington.翻译:中国驻华盛顿大使馆网站上周五发布的通知称，中国将从 1 月 1 日起简化美国游客的签证申请，减少所需材料。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 习近平敦促中国使节打造“外交铁军”
item.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping on Friday urged Chinese ambassadors to forge a "diplomatic iron army" loyal to the Communist Party, reviving the abrasive "Wolf Warrior" rhetoric propagated by some diplomats as a sign of China's increasingly assertive foreign policy.翻译:中国国家主席习近平周五敦促中国大使打造一支忠于共产党的“外交铁军”，重提一些外交官宣扬的粗暴“战狼”言论，以此作为中国日益自信的外交政策的标志。
item.author: Laurie Chen

item.title: 美国想遏制中国芯片产业。这家初创公司表明它并不容易
item.description: Last year, a veteran Silicon Valley software executive took the helm of a startup in his native China, company records show. The startup told potential investors it would sell microchip design software that is mostly available from just a handful of large Western companies.翻译:公司记录显示，去年，一位资深的硅谷软件高管在他的祖国中国掌管了一家初创公司。这家初创公司告诉潜在投资者，它将出售微芯片设计软件，这些软件主要由少数西方大型公司提供。
item.author: John Shiffman, Joshua Schneyer

item.title: 京东胜诉阿里巴巴反垄断诉讼
item.description: Chinese online retailer JD.com said on Friday that it won a lawsuit against rival Alibaba , which was fined 1 billion yuan ($140.68 million) for monopolistic practices.翻译:中国在线零售商京东周五表示，它赢得了对竞争对手阿里巴巴的诉讼，阿里巴巴因垄断行为被罚款 10 亿元人民币（1.4068 亿美元）。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 英伟达为中国推出新游戏芯片以遵守美国出口管制
item.description: U.S. chipmaker Nvidia on Thursday launched a modified version of an advanced gaming chip designed to comply with U.S. export controls targeting China.翻译:美国芯片制造商英伟达周四推出了先进游戏芯片的改进版本，旨在遵守美国针对中国的出口管制。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国的烟花爆竹禁令在农历新年前引发激烈争论
item.description: Chinese lawmakers on Friday weighed in on a fiery online debate on whether fireworks should be used to ring in the Lunar New Year in February, saying a total ban on pyrotechnics in the country credited with inventing them would be hard to implement.翻译:中国立法者周五在网上就是否应该用烟花爆竹来迎接二月农历新年的激烈争论进行了讨论，称在发明烟花爆竹的中国全面禁止烟花爆竹将很难实施。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国对咖啡的新需求引发了咖啡馆的激烈竞争
item.description: Chinese coffee consumption is growing quickly, spurring cut-throat competition between local and foreign coffee chains that have opened thousands of branded shops in recent months and surpassed the number of coffee stores in the United States.翻译:中国的咖啡消费量快速增长，引发了本地和外国咖啡连锁店之间的激烈竞争，近几个月来，这些咖啡连锁店开设了数千家品牌店，超过了美国的咖啡店数量。
item.author: Casey Hall, Marcelo Teixeira

item.title: 波音称中国航空公司将于2023年恢复运营所有737 MAX
item.description: All Boeing 737 MAX jets operated by Chinese carriers are back in service at the end of 2023, the U.S. planemaker's China head said on Friday, nearly a year after they started flying following a global grounding in 2019.翻译:美国飞机制造商中国区负责人周五表示，中国航空公司运营的所有波音 737 MAX 喷气式飞机将于 2023 年底恢复运营，距 2019 年全球停飞后开始飞行已近一年。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国雾霾天气，新年旅客做好应对潜在干扰的准备
item.description: Year-end holidaymakers across China were bracing for possible transport disruptions after the weather bureau on Friday warned that heavy fog and haze would shroud areas from Hebei province in the north to southern Shanghai for more than 24 hours.翻译:气象局周五警告称，从北部的河北省到上海南部的地区将被大雾霾笼罩超过24小时，中国各地的年终度假者正准备应对可能的交通中断。
item.author: Liz Lee

item.title: 香港流亡活动人士称，当局收钱让他提供线人
item.description: The former leader of a Hong Kong pro-independence group says he received up to HK$3,000 ($384) from security officers per meeting to become an informant when he was released from jail in June, before he fled to Britain and sought political asylum.翻译:香港独立派前领导人表示，6月出狱后，他每次会面都会从安全人员处获得高达3000港元（合384美元）的报酬，以成为一名线人，随后他逃往英国并寻求政治庇护。
item.author: Reuters
